items.sentence: It\'s been three years since Tom started working for Mary.
Tom has been studying at Harvard for the last three years.
Tom is having trouble coping with the high cost of living.
I don\'t like being made to do things I don\'t want to do.
The kidnappers gagged Tom and locked him up in the closet.
Tom says he\'ll sing that song he wrote about you tonight.
Tom says it\'s a waste of time to try to please everybody.
Tom says that he can\'t imagine going out in this weather.
Tom stood perfectly still, hoping he wouldn\'t be noticed.
Mary wanted to finish making breakfast before Tom woke up.
